item.title: How to Add a Progress Bar in Shepherd
item.description: Shepherd.js is an easy to use interactive onboarding user guide that can help visitors throughout the content of the app. This is very useful if you want to show your users around, focus on your product’s strengths or just help the others navigate in your app more easily. Shepherd.js is an open source software that I highly recommend, because it is easy to use, has great documentation, friendly support team and most importantly - it can improve user experience and help your site convert more!
